_comment: This is a test fixture covering the repositories key being an object instead of the more common array.
While rare and not recommended (because repository order is significant for package lookups),
it's what Composer <2.9 generated when using the CLI to modify or disable a repository (e.g. 'packagist.org').
Composer 2.9+ still supports this notation, but disallows the newly introduced name key inside repositories;
we want to explicitly handle and reject this case, although Composer also does so during validation.
When specifying repositories in this form, an existing repository is disabled using a simple false value.
A lock file is not needed for this case.
